DOC.brief_summary: Thumb carpometacarpal ( CMC ) arthritis affect 1 4 female 1 12 male . Patients fail respond conservative treatment may benefit surgery ; however , controversy exists effective surgical technique . A popular technique , ligament reconstruction tendon interposition ( LRTI ) involve trapeziectomy , follow reconstruction palmar oblique ligament use harvest flexor tendon wrist . We believe use suture fixation system reconstruct palmar oblique ligament , instead harvest wrist tendon , may provide superior repair . The objective study compare functional outcome measurement among patient receive CMC arthroplasty use suture fixation system ( investigational group ) receive LRTI surgery ( control group ) . We hypothesize patient investigational group demonstrate superior functionality , compare patient control group .
